headline: Perpetual to Pursue Wealth Management Sale, Rejects KKR Deal
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Perpetual Ltd. said it will pursue the sale of its wealth management business after rejecting the latest offer from KKR & Co., as the Australian financial services firm attempts to lure new offers.
